Visiting iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre: Parking, Amenities, Frequently Asked Questions Skip to content Shows Upgrades Visit Get Here Purchase Your Parking Bites and Drinks Accessibility The Need-To-Know Before You Go Venue Map FAQ Season Tickets Private Events ‚Ä¶ Where The Music's At Get Here iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre is located at 601-7 Sansburys Way, West Palm Beach, FL 33411. Directions Purchase Your Parking If you plan to park at the iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre, you will need to purchase one parking pass per vehicle. Parking options start at $20 per vehicle for general parking and may be purchased online in advance. Pick Your Parking Bites and Drinks Skip the preshow rush and dine with us! This season we‚Äôve added even more food and drink options with every fan in mind. Learn More Accessibility Whatever your needs, let us know how we can help. Whether that's with your arrival, exploring the venue, the show itself - or all of the above. We are here to help and accommodate at iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre. Learn More The Need-To-Know Before You Go From bag policy to parking, get to grips with everything you need to know here at iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre for your show. Learn More Venue Map Get lost in the music. Not the venue. So, here‚Äôs a map to help you get around. Download FAQ How do I enter iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre? There are a total of two entrance to the facility. North and South Gates are available for use regardless of the ticket type. The Fast Lane gate is located on the north side adjacent to the box office. You must have your Fast Lane pass to utilize this gate. The VIP Club has a separate entry gate located next to the box office. All guests using this gate must be VIP clients and have the appropriate ticket. What items do you allow in iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre? We allow: Clear plastic, vinyl or PVC tote bags no larger than 12‚Äù x 6‚Äù x 12‚Äù and/or small clutch bags (6‚Äùx 9‚Äù). Blankets Cameras ‚Äì nonprofessional only, no detachable lenses Food ‚Äì in a clear, 1-gallon ziplock bag Water ‚Äì up to 1 gallon in a factory sealed or empty bottle Umbrellas ‚Äì Small/personal only. (No large golf umbrellas) What items do you NOT allowed in iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre? Drones, outside lawn chairs and the following are not permitted into the venue: What happens in the event of an emergency? In the event of an emergency while on-site - iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre has trained paramedics to assist with any medical issues. First aid is located at the South entry gate, but any staff member with a radio can dispatch First Aid to the location needed. Local law enforcement officers are also on site for every event and can assist if needed or requested. Venue management works closely with all appropriate emergency agencies and services to ensure that we are up to date on any dangerous weather or potential crowd related issues. In the event of a weather emergency - we will communicate with guests that are inside of the facility as well as guests on their way to the venue. Please follow us on social media for the latest developments on event days: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/iTHINKFiAmp/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/ithinkfiamp Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ithinkfiamp/ When do the parking lots and gates open? Parking lots will generally open two hours¬†prior to our scheduled gate time. Gate times vary, but are usually one hour¬†prior to show time. Please check the specific event page as these dates are subject to change. Please do not attempt to enter the venue any earlier than the designated times as you will be turned around and told to return when the parking lots open. Can I rent a lawn chair? Lawn chairs are available for rent for most shows and must be turned in at the end of the event. Our rental chairs are 27.6‚Äù wide X 27.6‚Äù deep X 30.5‚Äù tall. No other chairs are permitted inside the venue. To rent a lawn chair in advance, click on the "UPGRADES AVAILABLE" dropdown on our upgrade page and select "Lawn Chair Rental". Lawn chairs are available for rent in advance or when you arrive at the lawn. Prices vary per show. Subject to availability. Is smoking permitted? Smoking is not permitted in the amphitheatre (e-cigarettes and vaping included). Guests may smoke on the lawn or in the plazas. If another guest complains about the smoke, we may ask you to refrain from smoking or move to another location. We appreciate your cooperation. Who should I go to if I need assistance? If you need assistance while at an event please visit our guest services area located in the north plaza or text us at 561-536-3822 with your seat location. Do you have a lost and found? If you lose an item while you are at an event- you can visit our Guest Services booth¬†located in the North Plaza to see if it has been turned in. If the item is not found the night of the show, please call us at 561-795-8883 or email us at iThinkAmpInquiry@LiveNation.com. Do you offer accommodations for those who may need hearing assistance? Guests that require assisted listening devices can contact our venue office prior to the event to arrange for a device. Please give us at least 2 days notice. We can be reached by phone at 561-795-8883 or by email at iThinkAmpInquiry@LiveNation.com. Do you offer overnight RV camping and parking at iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre? We offer overnight RV Camping/Parking here . This includes 50 AMP electric, water, and sewage. Check-in is at 3:00 PM on show day and check-out is 12:00 PM the following day. Do you have food & beverage available? The venue has a variety of delicious food and beverage options available for purchase .¬† Please note that items and pricing are subject to change from event to event. Never Miss a Beat. Or a Show. Plus, get highlights and exclusive offers from Live Nation Special Events. sign up FAQs What event spaces are available to rent for meetings or private events? iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre offers a variety of event spaces that can accommodate different capacities for your next meeting or private event. This allows you to choose the space that best fits your event's size and needs from Amphitheatre, Lawn, and VIP Club. What event services can I expect, including catering and vendor partnerships? We offer exceptional full-service event planning services with an experienced in-house team and established partnerships with premier vendors. Our event planning team will handle every detail including world-renowned artists packages, d√©cor, custom branding, state-of-the-art lighting, A/V equipment and sound. Let our culinary experts create an unparalleled dining experience with custom catering menus and bar packages. Contact us today to learn more about our services and how we can make your event a one-of-a-kind experience. Can the venue team book entertainment, bands, DJs, and keynote speakers for my event? Yes, iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre's in-house venue team has relationships with a variety of artists and DJs that they can recommend for your unique event. Live Nation is the largest entertainment company in the world, which gives us access to an extensive network of world-renowned artists and keynote speakers. What parking options are provided by the venue? iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre's event team can provide parking and valet options for your meeting or private event when applicable. We recommend contacting us directly for more information on parking and availability. Our team is happy to assist you with any questions regarding parking arrangements. Is this venue accessible to those with disability needs? iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre prioritizes accessibility and strives to make our venue accessible to everyone. If you have specific accessibility needs, inform our event specialists in advance with your requirements and the date assistance will be needed. On the day of the event, our staff will be ready to support you. Contact us today to learn more about our accessibility options and how we can ensure your experience is inclusive and enjoyable. What is the event scheduling process, and how early should I start planning? Don't miss out on securing your preferred dates, contact us today to start planning! Whether you need to plan a corporate event, daytime meeting, filming, photoshoot, fundraiser, and private concert, our event specialists are here to assist you. While we can accommodate quick turnarounds, it's always best to book as soon as possible to ensure your desired date is available. Our team will help schedule a site tour and provide a comprehensive overview of our venue's floor plans, amenities, event venue specs, and address any inquiries you may have. As the leading provider of live entertainment, we are committed to efficiently working with you to create a successful event. For help, go to moneyadviceservice.org.uk About Us Here at **iThink Finance**, we are proud of our *treat others how you would like to be treated* philosophy. With this being the groundwork of our company, we vow to help you make informed choices and to support your decision towards the realisation of your financial ambitions. Our wealth of experience in the finance industry gives us the opportunity to put our customers first by educating and prompting you to make sophisticated choices that ultimately benefit your financial end goals. We are dedicated to investing in all things that matter to us. This is why we take care in our partnerships, so that we can invest in you. Regulated by the FCA , we are recognised as a reputable credit broker. As a trusted source in online lending, we work with a network of lenders so that we can provide the most suitable products for UK residents. We pride ourselves on our in-depth market knowledge and take it upon ourselves to secure the most exclusive, low-interest deals. Mission Statement iThink Finance was fostered on the belief that everybody should have access to the tools required to bring their financial aspirations to life. Situated in the heart of London, we are here to set up the framework that will support those very ambitions and goals. Whether you are looking to start a new home project, cover large private medical expenses, or organise the wedding of your dreams, iThink Finance wants to be a part of that journey with you. ### Core Values Respect Respect of customers and our employees is fundamental to iThink Finance . Being respectful to individuals of all backgrounds and experiences will remain the foundation of our company. Trust Trust is having confidence in the honesty, reliability, and objectivity of a person or company. These values will continue to be a staple in everything we do, and we aim to inspire our customers to do the same. Objectivity To recognise the requirements of others is an approach we take in all affairs. Subsequently, regardless of the circumstances, we remain objective with our customers, employees, and professional partners. Transparency We oversee all business undertakings with total transparency. We want our customers to have clear guidance from the minute they land on the page and feel that they received exceptional customer experience right up until they leave. To safeguard this, we practise people before profit. We do not refrain from addressing that we receive a small commission from your application. But, this is not at the heart of what we do. Instead, we put the customers‚Äô needs above ours. In providing various different products, prioritising customer experience, and giving you access to our expert guides, we want to give you exactly what you need. ### What Makes Us Different? We know what it is like to have a vision. This is why we want to expand the pool of opportunity and offer support to those who want to realise their financial aspirations. Appropriately, we take pride in being extremely flexible and innovative. We work tirelessly 24/7 to find unique ways to support all financial pursuits and projects. Why Choose Us? We are passionate about ensuring customer satisfaction. This is why we work hard to keep our information up to date and take all feedback into consideration. We go the extra mile: We remain completely objective and ensure that you know the ins and outs of you loan, as well as the risks and benefits. Our application process is secure and confidential. We use 256-bit encryption protection, so all of your details are safe with us. This means that you do not have to worry about your details being passed onto third parties without your permission beforehand. iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre Accessibility Services Skip to content Shows Upgrades Visit Get Here Purchase Your Parking Bites and Drinks Accessibility The Need-To-Know Before You Go Venue Map FAQ Season Tickets Private Events ‚Ä¶ Accessibility Accessibility Services iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre strives to ensure that all of our guests have a great time at our venue. If you need additional assistance while you are here, please make sure you let us know. Ticketing: Accessible tickets can be purchased online via ithinkfiamp.com . You do not need to call the box office to place an order as all of our accessible tickets are available through our website. Look for the logo on the Find Tickets page to view all available accessible seats. We do have accessible seating in every price range but be advised it does occasionally sell out. We have very limited seating available for guests on the day of the event so please make sure you purchase accessible seating when you order tickets. Restrooms: All venue restrooms are accessible. Day of Show Parking: Accessible Parking - To park in an accessible parking space, you will need a valid, state-issued accessible placard or license plate and a venue parking pass. Parking passes can be purchased online via Ticketmaster in advance or on the day of the show with a credit card when you arrive at the parking lots.¬† Accessible spaces are limited and first come, first served. Our parking crew will work to accommodate you if all accessible spaces are full. Dropping off fans near the gates prior to parking is also allowed. Please note: Parking is sold separately from concert tickets.¬† You will need to purchase a parking pass if you plan to park at the venue. Unexpected Needs: If you have had an injury or illness that prevents you from using the original seat you purchased, we strongly recommend going through www.livenation.com to exchange all tickets for accessible seating. We will have a very limited number of seats available on the day of the show for such issues, but we cannot guarantee we will be able to seat you. Please remember that accessible seating permits for the guest with the accessible need and one companion. Interpreter Requests: If you will need an interpreter for an event, please give us at least 2 weeks notice to secure. Guests who request an interpreter will need to pick up their tickets at will call. When the tickets are picked up we will introduce you to your interpreter for the evening and take you to your seats. Please contact iThinkAmpInquiry@LiveNation.com to arrange for an interpreter for your visit. Hearing Assistance: Guests who require assisted listening devices can contact our venue office prior to the event to arrange for a device. Please give us at least 2 days' notice. We can be reached at iThinkAmpInquiry@LiveNation.com . Service Animals: At iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre, we have specific guidelines to ensure all guests, and their service animals are supported throughout their visit. Service animals are defined by the ADA (Americans with Disabilities Act) as dogs or miniature horses that are trained to do work to perform tasks related to people with disabilities. The work or task the service animal is trained to do must directly relate to the person's disability. Service animals must be housebroken. Service animals are required to behave and not repeatedly bark, growl, jump up on or lunge at other guests or employees. Corrective action must be taken if the service animal is not behaving appropriately. Dogs whose sole function is to provide comfort or emotional support do not qualify as service animals under the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). Comfort animals, emotional support animals, and therapy dogs are not listed as service animals under Title III of the ADA.¬† This also applies to the other species of animals wild or domestic, trained, or untrained.¬† The ADA requires the service animal to be under the control of the handler. This may include using a harness, leash, or other tether. Our venue employees are not required to provide for, the care, or supervision of a service animal, including cleaning up after it. Service Animals must remain on the floor and are not allowed on dining chairs or tables in our food and beverage locations.¬† Live Nation and our operating partners have the right to deny access to a dog that disrupts our operations. You can reach the box office by phone at (561) 795-8883 or by email at iThinkAmpInquiry@LiveNation.com. When is the box office open? The box office is open on Fridays from 12 PM to 6 PM, and on show days from 12 PM until showtime. Please note that only credit card transactions are accepted at the box office. What payment types are accepted? iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre is a cashless venue. All points of sale accept credit, debit, or mobile payments such as Apple Pay and Google Pay. Accepted cards include Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover. If you arrive without a card, you can visit a cash-to-card booth on-site to exchange cash for a prepaid card at no cost and with no fees. What are the will call rules? Will call is located at the venue box office and is open from 12 PM until showtime. To pick up tickets, guests must bring the original credit card used for purchase, a valid photo ID, and their Ticketmaster confirmation number. What are the parking options at iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre ? Parking lots open approximately three hours before showtime. Premier Parking is available for purchase online in advance, with prices varying by show. On the day of the event, Premier Parking is offered on a first-come basis and is credit card only. Will call for Premier Parking is located at Gate 2A, off Process Drive/Weisman Way. Accessible parking is available in Lot 6, adjacent to the main gate. A valid accessible placard must be displayed, and guests arriving early may be subject to an additional parking fee. Is there accessible seating? Yes, the venue is fully accessible. Guests in need of a sign language interpreter should call (561) 795-8883 at least three weeks before the event to make arrangements. Assisted listening devices are available at the Guest Services booth in the North Plaza and can be provided free of charge with valid ID. To reserve a device in advance, email iThinkAmpInquiry@LiveNation.com at least two days prior to the show. What are the general rules of iTHINK Financial Amphitheatre ? This is a mobile-entry-only venue, so please download your ticket in advance. Screenshots or photos will not be accepted. If a reprint is needed and possible, a $5 fee per ticket will apply. The venue has a clear bag policy: only clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC bags no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" are permitted, along with small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5". Lawn seating is general admission in an uncovered area where blankets are allowed, but outside lawn chairs are not permitted. Lawn chairs are available for rent on-site for $10, subject to availability. Smoking is allowed in designated lawn areas. Prohibited items include weapons, alcohol, illegal substances, glass containers, cans, hard-sided or large coolers, laser pointers, fireworks, and pets (except service animals). Allowed items include food in clear plastic bags, blankets, small umbrellas or parasols, and one sealed water bottle (up to 20 oz). Are children allowed? Infants under the age of two may enter for free but must receive a pass from the box office on the day of the show. Children aged two and older must have a ticket. For families, a smoke- and alcohol-free Family Zone is located at the bottom of the lawn. Please note that age policies may vary depending on the event, so it's best to contact the box office to confirm. Seating chart Select the event to see the seating chart.
